home.title: BS Platform
home.subtitle: Connect with skilled workers in your city. Search, hire, and manage services easily with our premium platform.
home.howToStartDescription: Register your account, complete your profile with your skills and city, and start offering your services to clients nearby. Build your reputation and get hired faster!
home.step1Description: Create your account and verify your identity to get started
home.step2Description: Add your skills, experience, and location details
home.step3Description: Get hired and build your professional reputation

register.title: Join Our Platform
register.subtitle: Please provide accurate and complete information. It will help us verify your profile and connect you with the right opportunities.

login.title: Welcome Back
login.subtitle: Login with your credentials to access your dashboard.

about.title: About BeauService
about.subtitle: Connecting skilled professionals with clients who value quality service
about.ourStoryContent1: Founded in 2025, BeauService connects skilled professionals with clients who need quality services. We're revolutionizing the service industry through technology and trust.
about.ourStoryContent2: Our platform verifies all professionals to ensure you get the best service every time. We believe in creating opportunities for skilled workers while providing clients with reliable, high-quality services.
about.ourMissionContent: To make finding reliable service professionals as easy as a few clicks, while providing workers with fair opportunities and growth.
about.seamlessConnection: Seamless connection between clients and professionals

contact.title: Contact Support
contact.subtitle: Need help or have a question? Reach out to us using the form below.
contact.description: Our team will carefully review your message and get back to you as soon as possible. We're here to assist you with any concerns, feedback, or support you may need.
contact.subject: Subject
contact.successMessage: Message sent successfully! Our team will get back to you soon.
contact.errorMessage: Something went wrong. Please try again.
contact.footerMessage: Once your message is received, our team will prioritize it and respond accordingly. We appreciate your trust and will make sure your concerns are addressed with care.
